nodes.text:
A power wrench was a tool presumably similar in use to a hydrospanner.
In 3956 BBY, Revan used a presumably similar tool called an arc wrench to try to access HK-47's memory core.
Luke Skywalker kept a power wrench in the garage of the Lars homestead on Tatooine, and used it for repair work on his T-16 skyhopper.
In 8 ABY Chewbacca used power wrench for taking out old sensor array window when working on Millennium Falcon.
